title: Kat is busted
body:
https://youtu.be/HGE6DIAni2g

"no champion should be able to one shot"

replies.body:
Wow how dare a fed assassin 4 levels above a squishy champion kill them because the squishy was stupid enough to walk near the fucking dagger after it dropped down?
You're right, she needs to be gutted.

Here's the match.
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2482039253/234491978?tab=overview

16/0 Katarina {{item:3070}} Check
No health or magic resist teemo. {{item:3070}} Check
4 Levels higher {{item:3070}} Check
0/7 ally midlaner {{item:3070}} Check

Results are in
{{item:3070}}{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 

Anyone can oneshot when they're 16/0 lmao

Riot's policy has never been that champions should not be able to one-shot others, if you think otherwise then you are taking a quote out of context.

The score is 27 to 7, 4 towers to 1, Kat was ahead by four levels.

Four.

Levels.

The game was over, your team failed in a big way and looking at this kill shows absolutely nothing about why you lost this game. Plenty of champions are allowed to one shot under such situations and plenty of champions can one shot way before things get this far out of hand.
